display_long_description:
Snail Mechanics is currently in early access and will update regularly!

Snail Mechanics - the ultimate slimy, squishy, spaceship repair game! Join the snail mechanics in a race against time to fix spaceships at the Snail’s P(l)ace Garage, orbiting their home planet of Gastropodus. It’s a busy day, and they could use your help to fix spaceships flying in off the space freeway. Whoever said a snail’s pace is slow hasn’t met these snail mechanics! Can you keep up with the repairs?

In Snail Mechanics, it’s a race against the clock to find and repair broken parts on each ship that flies into the garage. But you must work with the snail mechanics to get the job done. Squeegee off the space shields, suction brolluscs out of the vents, glue pipes with snail slime, and more! You can play solo or in a shared space with a friend in local co-op mode.  

Thanks for checking out Snail Mechanics! We're still working on the game, but we've got a demo ready for you to try. Help shape the future of Snail Mechanics! Try our demo and share your feedback on our Discord: https://discord.gg/KbAfAVUacs. We can't wait to hear what you have to say. Thank you!
